__e: I have seen the devil seated on his throne in his Palace of Gold.
Her coat, it's slightly damp, she's been in heavy rain in the last few hours.
There is a pilot with a migraine when he wakes up who wishes you could have at least thrown on the cape.
We don't want to get blood all over your pretty white cloak.
Baby, I'm so sorry about all this cloak and dagger stuff.
So in the morning she shows him the cloak and she asks him, "What do you think, kind sir?"
"But I know what you'll do. "I know it as surely as if I could be there watching... "when they give you that red robe and miter."
Oh! Now look, may I please have my coat before your next patient eats it? Right.
I know you're trying to find out where I hang my cape.
